00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   createinfo(argc, argv);
00031 
00032   /* enough arguments ? */
00033 
00034   if (argc < 2) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstate"
00036             "\n   -A             show all eigenstates\n", argv[0]);
00037     exit(-1);
00038   }
00039 
00040   int all=0;
00041 
00042   char c;
00043 
00044   /* manage command-line options */
00045 
00046   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "A")) != -1)
00047     switch (c) {
00048     case 'A':
00049       all=1;
00050       break;
00051     }
00052 
00053   char* mcstatefile = argv[optind];
00054   char** mbfile;
00055

00057   Projection P;
00058   MultiSlaterDet* Q;
00059   Indices* In;

00061   int n;
00062 
00063   readMultiMulticonfigfile(mcstatefile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &In, &n, &E);
00064 
00065   fprintf(stderr, "n: %d\n", n);
00066   for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00067     fprintf(stderr, "In[%d].n: %d\n", i, In[i].n);
00068 
00069   int a,b; 
00070 
00071   void* emome[n*n]; 
00072   void* edipme[n*n]; 
00073   void* mdipme[n*n]; 
00074   void* equadme[n*n];
00075 
00076   for (b=0; b<n; b++)   
00077     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00078       emome[a+b*n] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEMonopole, &Q[a], &Q[b]);
00079       edipme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEDipole, &Q[a], &Q[b]);
00080       mdipme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpMDipole, &Q[a], &Q[b]);
00081       equadme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEQuadrupole, &Q[a], &Q[b]);
00082     }
00083 
00084   // read or calculate matrix elements
00085   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00086     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00087       if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &Q[a], &Q[b],
00088                                          &P, &OpEMonopole, emome[a+b*n])) {
00089         calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEMonopole, &Q[a], &Q[b], emome[a+b*n]);
00090         writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &Q[a], &Q[b], 
00091                                       &P, &OpEMonopole, emome[a+b*n]);
00092       }
00093       if (readprojectedMultiMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &Q[a], &Q[b],
00094                                          &P, &OpEDipole, edipme[a+b*n])) {
00095         calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEDipole, &Q[a], &Q[b], edipme[a+b*n]);

00097                                       &P, &OpEDipole, edipme[a+b*n]);
00098       }

00100                                          &P, &OpMDipole, mdipme[a+b*n])) {
00101         calcprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpMDipole, &Q[a], &Q[b], mdipme[a+b*n]);
00102         writeprojectedMultiMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &Q[a], &Q[b], 
00103                                       &P, &OpMDipole, mdipme[a+b*n]);
00104       }

00106                                          &P, &OpEQuadrupole, equadme[a+b*n])) {

00112 
00113 
00114   fprintf(stderr, "calculate exectation values\n");
00115 
00116   // dimension of many-body basis
00117   // beware: matrix elements are calculated in larger basis
00118 
00119   int dim=0;
00120   for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00121     dim += In[i].n;
00122 
00123   // calculate expectation values
00124   void* emoexp = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpEMonopole, dim);
00125   calcexpectprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEMonopole, emome, Q, In, n, &E, emoexp);
00126 
00127   void* edipexp = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpEDipole, dim);
00128   calcexpectprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEDipole, edipme, Q, In, n, &E, edipexp);

00135 
00136   fprintf(stderr, "calculate transition strengths\n");
00137 
00138   // calculate transition strengths
00139   void* emotrans = initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpEMonopole, dim, dim);
00140   calctransitionprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEMonopole, emome, Q, Q, In, In, n, n, &E, &E, emotrans);
00141 
00142   void* ediptrans = initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpEDipole, dim, dim);
00143   calctransitionprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEDipole, edipme, Q, Q, In, In, n, n, &E, &E, ediptrans);
00144 
00145   void* mdiptrans = initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpMDipole, dim, dim);

00147 
00148   void* equadtrans = initprojectedtransitionVector(&P, &OpEQuadrupole, dim, dim);
00149   calctransitionprojectedMultiMBME(&P, &OpEQuadrupole, equadme, Q, Q, In, In, n, n, &E, &E, equadtrans);
00150 
00151 
00152   // output
00153 
00154   char outfile[255];

00157 
00158   snprintf(tostrip, 255, ".states");
00159   snprintf(outfile, 255, "%s.trans", stripstr(mcstatefile, tostrip));
00160   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00161     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00162     goto cleanup;

00164 
00165   fprintinfo(outfp);

00167 
00168   writeprojectedEMMultipoles(outfp,
00169                              &P, emoexp, edipexp, mdipexp, equadexp, &E);
00170 
00171   writeprojectedtransitionEMMultipoles(outfp,
